definition: To exist and experience the state of being alive, encompassing various activities, emotions, and interactions with others. It is commonly used to describe the fundamental act of living, encompassing both physical and mental aspects, as well as the overall experience of life.

examples.german: Er lebte lange Zeit im Ausland.
examples.english: He lived abroad for a long time.

examples.german: Wir sollten jeden Tag leben, als wäre es unser letzter.
examples.english: We should live every day as if it were our last.

examples.german: Das Buch erzählt die Geschichte eines Mannes, der zwei Leben lebt.
examples.english: The book tells the story of a man who lives two lives.
